PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.RESPONSIBLE_PARTY_INTRO: The party re­spon­si­ble in terms of data pro­tec­tion laws, par­tic­u­lar­ly the EU General Data Pro­tec­tion Reg­u­la­tion (GDPR), is:
PRIVACY_POLICY.YOUR_RIGHTS_INTRO: You can ex­er­cise the fol­low­ing rights at any time using the contact details pro­vid­ed for our data pro­tec­tion of­fi­cer:
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM1: In­for­ma­tion about your data stored by us and its pro­cess­ing (Art. 15 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM2: Cor­rec­tion of in­ac­cu­rate per­son­al data (Art. 16 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM3: De­le­tion of your data stored by us (Art. 17 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM4: Re­stric­tion of data pro­cess­ing, pro­vid­ed we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obli­ga­tions (Art. 18 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM5: Ob­jec­tion to the pro­cess­ing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR), and
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_ITEM6: Data porta­bil­i­ty, pro­vid­ed you have con­sent­ed to data pro­cess­ing or con­clud­ed a contract with us (Art. 20 GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONSENT_REVOCATION: If you have given us your consent, you can with­draw it at any time with effect for the future.
PRIVACY_POLICY.COMPLAINT_AUTHORITY: You can always contact a super­vi­so­ry au­thor­i­ty with a com­plaint, e.g., the com­pe­tent super­vi­so­ry au­thor­i­ty of your federal state of res­i­dence or the au­thor­i­ty re­spon­si­ble for us as the re­spon­si­ble body.
PRIVACY_POLICY.AUTHORITY_LIST_INTRO: A list of super­vi­so­ry au­thor­i­ties (for the non-public sector) with ad­dress­es can be found at:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_TITLE: Col­lec­tion of general in­for­ma­tion when vis­it­ing our website
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PARAGRAPH1: When you access our website, i.e., if you do not reg­is­ter or other­wise trans­mit in­for­ma­tion, in­for­ma­tion of a general nature is auto­mat­i­cal­ly col­lect­ed. This in­for­ma­tion (server log files) in­cludes, for example, the type of web browser, the oper­at­ing system used, the domain name of your internet service pro­vid­er, your IP address, and sim­i­lar.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PARAGRAPH2: It is pro­cessed in par­tic­u­lar for the fol­low­ing pur­pos­es:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM1: En­sur­ing a problem-free con­nec­tion to the website,
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM2: En­sur­ing smooth use of our website,
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM3: Eval­u­a­tion of system se­cu­ri­ty and sta­bil­i­ty, and
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_ITEM4: for the op­ti­mi­za­tion of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PARAGRAPH3: We do not use your data to draw con­clu­sions about your person. In­for­ma­tion of this kind is sta­tis­ti­cal­ly eval­u­at­ed by us anony­mous­ly, if nec­es­sary, to op­ti­mize our internet pres­ence and the tech­nol­o­gy behind it.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH1: Pro­cess­ing is carried out in ac­cor­dance with Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR on the basis of our le­git­i­mate in­ter­est in im­prov­ing the sta­bil­i­ty and func­tion­al­i­ty of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_RECIPIENT_PARAGRAPH1: Re­cip­i­ents of the data may be tech­ni­cal service pro­vid­ers who act as pro­ces­sors for the oper­a­tion and main­te­nance of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH1: The data will be deleted as soon as they are no longer re­quired for the purpose of their col­lec­tion. This is gen­er­al­ly the case for data used to pro­vide the website when the re­spec­tive session has ended.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH2: In the case of data storage in log files, this is the case after 14 days at the latest. Storage beyond this is pos­si­ble. In this case, the IP ad­dress­es of the users are anony­mized, so that an as­sign­ment of the calling client is no longer pos­si­ble.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_INFO_PROVISION_REQUIRED_PARAGRAP: The pro­vi­sion of the afore­men­tioned per­son­al data is neither legally nor con­trac­tu­al­ly re­quired. However, without the IP address, the service and func­tion­al­i­ty of our website cannot be guar­an­teed. In ad­di­tion, in­di­vid­u&al services may not be avail­able or may be re­strict­ed. For this reason, an ob­jec­tion is ex­clud­ed.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_PARAGRAPH1: The data you enter will be stored for the purpose of in­di­vid­u&al com­mu­ni­ca­tion with you. For this, a valid e-mail address and your name are re­quired. This serves to assign the request and sub­se­quent­ly answer it. The pro­vi­sion of further data is op­tion­al.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH1: The pro­cess­ing of the data entered into the contact form is carried out on the basis of a le­git­i­mate in­ter­est (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH2: By pro­vid­ing the contact form, we want to enable you to contact us easily. Your in­for­ma­tion will be stored for the purpose of pro­cess­ing the request and for pos­si­ble follow-up questions.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_LEGAL_BASIS_PARAGRAPH3: If you contact us to request an offer, the data entered into the contact form will be pro­cessed for the purpose of carrying out pre-con­trac­tu­al meas­ures (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_RECIPIENT_PARAGRAPH1: Re­cip­i­ents of the data may be pro­ces­sors.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH1: Data will be deleted at the latest 6 months after pro­cess­ing the request.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_STORAGE_DURATION_PARAGRAPH2: If a con­trac­tu­al re­la­tion­ship arises, we are subject to the statu­to­ry re­ten­tion periods ac­cord­ing to HGB and will delete your data after these periods have ex­pired.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_PROVISION_REQUIRED_PARAGRAP: The pro­vi­sion of your per­son­al data is vol­un­tary. However, we can only pro­cess your request if you pro­vide us with your name, your e-mail address and the reason for the request.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_WEB_FONTS_TITLE: Use of script li­brar­ies (Google Web Fonts)
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_WEB_FONTS_PARAGRAPH1: To display our content cor­rect­ly and graph­i­cal­ly ap­peal­ing across browsers, we use “Google Web Fonts” from Google LLC (1600 Amphi­the­atre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA; here­in­af­ter “Google”) on this website for the display of fonts.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_WEB_FONTS_PARAGRAPH2_PART1: Further in­for­ma­tion on Google Web Fonts can be found at
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH1_PART1: On this website, we use the Google Maps service. Google Maps is oper­at­ed by Google LLC, 1600 Amphi­the­atre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA (here­in­af­ter “Google”). This allows us to display in­ter­ac­tive maps di­rect­ly on the website and enables you to con­ve­nient­ly use the map func­tion.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH1_PART2: Further in­for­ma­tion about data pro­cess­ing by Google can be found in Google's privacy policy:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH1_PART3: There you can also change your per­son­al data pro­tec­tion set­tings in the data pro­tec­tion center.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH2_PART1: De­tailed in­struc­tions on man­ag­ing your own data in con­nec­tion with Google prod­ucts can be found here:
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH3: By vis­it­ing the website, Google re­ceives in­for­ma­tion that you have ac­cessed the cor­re­spond­ing subpage of our website. This occurs re­gard­less of whether Google pro­vides a user ac­count through which you are logged in, or whether no user ac­count exists. If you are logged in to Google, your data will be di­rect­ly as­signed to your ac­count.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_PARAGRAPH4: If you do not wish the as­sign­ment in your profile on Google, you must log out of Google before ac­ti­vat­ing the button. Google stores your data as usage pro­files and uses them for pur­pos­es of ad­ver­tis­ing, market re­search and/or needs-based design of its web­sites. Such an eval­u­a­tion takes place in par­tic­u­lar (even for users who are not logged in) to pro­vide needs-based ad­ver­tis­ing and to in­form other users of the social net­work about your ac­tiv­i­ties on our website. You have a right to object to the cre­ation of these user pro­files, whereby you must contact Google to ex­er­cise this right.
PRIVACY_POLICY.GOOGLE_MAPS_CONSENT_REVOCATION_PARAGRAPH: The pro­vid­er cur­rent­ly does not offer an option for easy opt-out or block­ing of data trans­mis­sion. If you want to pre­vent track­ing of your ac­tiv­i­ties on our website, please revoke your consent for the cor­re­spond­ing cookie cat­e­go­ry or all tech­ni­cal­ly un­nec­es­sary cookies and data trans­mis­sions in the cookie consent tool. In this case, however, you may not be able to use our website or only to a limited ex­tent.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SSL_ENCRYPTION_PARAGRAPH1: To pro­tect the se­cu­ri­ty of your data during trans­mis­sion, we use en­cryp­tion methods (e.g., SSL) cor­re­spond­ing to the cur­rent state of the art via HTTPS.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_TO_OBJECT_TITLE: In­for­ma­tion about your right to object ac­cord­ing to Art. 21 GDPR
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_TO_OBJECT_PARAGRAPH1: You have the right, for reasons arising from your par­tic­u­lar sit­u­a­tion, to object at any time to the pro­cess­ing of per­son­al data con­cern­ing you, which is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (data pro­cess­ing on the basis of a bal­anc­ing of in­ter­ests); this also ap­plies to pro­fil­ing based on this pro­vi­sion within the meaning of Art. 4 No. 4 GDPR.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_TO_OBJECT_PARAGRAPH2: If you object, we will no longer pro­cess your per­son­al data unless we can demon­strate com­pelling le­git­i­mate grounds for the pro­cess­ing that over­ride your in­ter­ests, rights and free­doms, or the pro­cess­ing serves the as­ser­tion, ex­er­cise or defense of legal claims.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CHANGES_PARAGRAPH1: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy so that it always com­plies with cur­rent legal re­quire­ments or to im­ple­ment changes to our services in the privacy policy, e.g., when in­tro­duc­ing new services. The new privacy policy then ap­plies to your re­newed visit.
PRIVACY_POLICY.QUESTIONS_TITLE: Questions to the data pro­tec­tion of­fi­cer
PRIVACY_POLICY.QUESTIONS_PARAGRAPH1: If you have any questions about data pro­tec­tion, please send us an e-mail or contact the person re­spon­si­ble for data pro­tec­tion in our or­gan­i­za­tion di­rect­ly:
PRIVACY_POLICY.FOOTNOTE_PART1: The privacy policy was cre­at­ed with the help of activeMind AG, the ex­perts for

ABOUT_ME.MAIN_TEXT: I love IT because it lets me solve real-world problems with code. Building apps from scratch makes me happy.
ABOUT_ME.LOCATION_TEXT: I am based in Berlin and Dresden and am very open to remote work.
ABOUT_ME.EDUCATION_TEXT: I’m passionate about exploring new technologies and learning new skills.
ABOUT_ME.PROBLEM_SOLVING_TEXT: I tackle challenges step by step: during my Physics studies I learned to solve complex problems with perseverance.

CONTACT.BODY_TEXT_PART1: Feel free to reach out if you’re looking for someone who’s eager to learn, works meticulously, and thrives in a team.
CONTACT.BODY_TEXT_PART2: I’m passionate about crafting clean, user-friendly interfaces and adding real value to your projects.

PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_INTRO: Here is a selection of my work – please explore them in action.

PROJECT_1.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

PROJECT_2.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

PROJECT_3.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Lieferando-style food ordering platform. It lets you browse menus from multiple local restaurants, customize your dishes and place orders in just a few clicks.

REFERENCES.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

REFERENCE_1.TEXT: Cecilia demonstrated team and problem-solving skills with a self-motivated attitude to learn new programs. She was able to carry forth the project.
REFERENCE_1.AUTHOR: Uni. Prof. Dr. A. Niendorf

REFERENCE_2.TEXT: Ms. Diesch showed a high level of commitment in all areas of responsibility and a very quick grasp.
REFERENCE_2.AUTHOR: A. Martin

REFERENCE_3.TEXT: She has been an indispensable part of our team. Her loyalty and highly motivating kind helped through many processes as well as her courage of trying out the unknown.
REFERENCE_3.AUTHOR: M. Lederer

REFERENCE_4.TEXT: Ms. Diesch worked very conscientiously and as a team player. We got to know her as a friendly employee and would hire her again at any time.
REFERENCE_4.AUTHOR: Prof. Dr. med. P. Ghadjar

REFERENCE_5.TEXT: I particularly appreciate Cecilia’s resilience and her ability to keep an overview even under pressure.
REFERENCE_5.AUTHOR: P. Wagner

SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: This is an overview of my front-end toolkit. Until now, I mainly worked on JavaScript/TypeScript in Angular, backed by Firebase and GitHub.
SKILLS.NOTE: Feel free to reach out—I’m always open to learn new technologies and frameworks.
